languages.text: {n}Глаза Бастьяна на мгновение расширяются — он переваривает полученную информацию.{/n} "Какая потеря! Какая ужасная потеря... Примите соболезнования, Ваша Светлость! В свете Императора да пребудут ушедшие праведно, в памяти потомков да не угаснет их свет... Примите также поздравления с обретением статуса Вольного Торговца, пусть оно и случилось по столь трагической причине".

{n}Bastian's eyes go wide for a moment as he processes the new information.{/n} "What a tragedy! What a terrible loss... Please accept my condolences, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! May the Emperor's light be with the righteously departed, may their brilliance never dim in the memory of their descendants... And please likewise accept my congratulations on attaining the status of Rogue Trader, albeit as a consequence of such a tragic event."

Примите также поздравления с обретением статуса Вольного Торговца, пусть оно и случилось по столь трагической причине".

languages.text: {n}バスティアンは新たな情報をかみ砕きながら目を大きく見開いた。{/n}「なんという悲劇でしょう！あの方ほど偉大なお方をなくすとは…心からの哀悼を表します、陛下！皇帝の御光が正義の亡者と共にあり、子孫の記憶の中で輝き続けますよう…そして、悲劇的な出来事の結果とはいえ、新たに自由開拓者の地位を得たことを祝福いたします」
languages.original_text: {n}Bastian's eyes go wide for a moment as he processes the new information.{/n} "What a tragedy! What a terrible loss... Please accept my condolences, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! May the Emperor's light be with the righteously departed, may their brilliance never dim in the memory of their descendants... And please likewise accept my congratulations on attaining the status of Rogue Trader, albeit as a consequence of such a tragic event."

traits.locale_text: {n}バスティアンは新たな情報をかみ砕きながら目を大きく見開いた。{/n}「なんという悲劇でしょう！あの方ほど偉大なお方をなくすとは…心からの哀悼を表します、陛下！皇帝の御光が正義の亡者と共にあり、子孫の記憶の中で輝き続けますよう…そして、悲劇的な出来事の結果とはいえ、新たに自由開拓者の地位を得たことを祝福いたします」

languages.text: {n}巴斯蒂安瞪大了眼睛，努力地消化着新的事实。{/n}“这真是一场悲剧！多么可怕的损失啊……请接受我的哀悼，大人！愿帝皇的光明与逝去的正义之人同在，愿逝者的光辉永远保留在后人的记忆之中，永不暗淡……与此同时，请允许我祝贺您继承了行商浪人的地位，尽管这是由悲惨事件带来的结果。”
languages.original_text: {n}Bastian's eyes go wide for a moment as he processes the new information.{/n} "What a tragedy! What a terrible loss... Please accept my condolences, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! May the Emperor's light be with the righteously departed, may their brilliance never dim in the memory of their descendants... And please likewise accept my congratulations on attaining the status of Rogue Trader, albeit as a consequence of such a tragic event."

traits.locale_text: {n}巴斯蒂安瞪大了眼睛，努力地消化着新的事实。{/n}“这真是一场悲剧！多么可怕的损失啊……请接受我的哀悼，大人！愿帝皇的光明与逝去的正义之人同在，愿逝者的光辉永远保留在后人的记忆之中，永不暗淡……与此同时，请允许我祝贺您继承了行商浪人的地位，尽管这是由悲惨事件带来的结果。”

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Bastian parecen estallar mientras procesa esta nueva información.{/n} «¡Menuda tragedia! Una pérdida terrible... ¡Acepte mis condolencias, {mf|milord|milady}! Que la luz del Emperador acompañe a los difuntos piadosos y que su fulgor no se extinga en el recuerdo de sus descendientes... Y, por favor, acepte mi enhorabuena por asumir el cargo de Comerciante Independiente, aunque sea por consecuencia de tal catástrofe».
languages.original_text: {n}Bastian's eyes go wide for a moment as he processes the new information.{/n} "What a tragedy! What a terrible loss... Please accept my condolences, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! May the Emperor's light be with the righteously departed, may their brilliance never dim in the memory of their descendants... And please likewise accept my congratulations on attaining the status of Rogue Trader, albeit as a consequence of such a tragic event."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Bastian parecen estallar mientras procesa esta nueva información.{/n} «¡Menuda tragedia! Una pérdida terrible... ¡Acepte mis condolencias, {mf|milord|milady}! Que la luz del Emperador acompañe a los difuntos piadosos y que su fulgor no se extinga en el recuerdo de sus descendientes... Y, por favor, acepte mi enhorabuena por asumir el cargo de Comerciante Independiente, aunque sea por consecuencia de tal catástrofe».

languages.text: {n}Bastian écarquille les yeux sous le coup de la surprise.{/n} « Quelle tragédie ! C'est une terrible perte... Je vous présente mes plus sincères condoléances, Votre Seigneurie ! Puisse la lumière de l'Empereur accompagner les vertueux défunts, et que leur clarté illumine à jamais la mémoire de leurs descendants... Veuillez également accepter mes félicitations pour votre nouveau statut de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, même s'il est la conséquence d'un dramatique événement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Bastian's eyes go wide for a moment as he processes the new information.{/n} "What a tragedy! What a terrible loss... Please accept my condolences, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! May the Emperor's light be with the righteously departed, may their brilliance never dim in the memory of their descendants... And please likewise accept my congratulations on attaining the status of Rogue Trader, albeit as a consequence of such a tragic event."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bastian écarquille les yeux sous le coup de la surprise.{/n} « Quelle tragédie ! C'est une terrible perte... Je vous présente mes plus sincères condoléances, Votre Seigneurie ! Puisse la lumière de l'Empereur accompagner les vertueux défunts, et que leur clarté illumine à jamais la mémoire de leurs descendants... Veuillez également accepter mes félicitations pour votre nouveau statut de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, même s'il est la conséquence d'un dramatique événement. »

languages.text: {n}Bastians Augen weiten sich kurzzeitig, bis er die neue Information verarbeitet hat.{/n} "Was für eine Tragödie! Was für ein schrecklicher Verlust ... Bitte nehmt mein Beileid entgegen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Möge das Licht des Imperators die Dahingeschiedene begleiten und ihre Strahlkraft in der Erinnerung ihrer Nachkommen niemals verblassen ... Und akzeptiert bitte zudem meine Glückwünsche zum Status {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, auch wenn dies als Folge eines derart tragischen Vorfalls erfolgte."
languages.original_text: {n}Bastian's eyes go wide for a moment as he processes the new information.{/n} "What a tragedy! What a terrible loss... Please accept my condolences, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! May the Emperor's light be with the righteously departed, may their brilliance never dim in the memory of their descendants... And please likewise accept my congratulations on attaining the status of Rogue Trader, albeit as a consequence of such a tragic event."

Bitte nehmt mein Beileid entgegen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Möge das Licht des Imperators die Dahingeschiedene begleiten und ihre Strahlkraft in der Erinnerung ihrer Nachkommen niemals verblassen ... Und akzeptiert bitte zudem meine Glückwünsche zum Status {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, auch wenn dies als Folge eines derart tragischen Vorfalls erfolgte."

languages.text: {n}Bastian'ın gözleri, bu yeni bilginin ışığında bir anlığına yuvalarından fırlayacak gibi oluyor.{/n} "Ne korkunç bir trajedi! Ne büyük bir kayıp! Lütfen taziye dileklerimi kabul buyurun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! İmparator'un nuru, aramızdan ayrılan erdemlileri aydınlatsın. Işıkları hiç sönmesin, torunlarının anılarında ebediyen yansın. Ayrıca böylesi bir trajedinin neticesinde olsa da Hür Tacirlik makamına eriştiğiniz için tebriklerimi sunarım."
languages.original_text: {n}Bastian's eyes go wide for a moment as he processes the new information.{/n} "What a tragedy! What a terrible loss... Please accept my condolences, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! May the Emperor's light be with the righteously departed, may their brilliance never dim in the memory of their descendants... And please likewise accept my congratulations on attaining the status of Rogue Trader, albeit as a consequence of such a tragic event."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu yeni bilginin ışığında Bastian'ın gözleri yuvalarından fırlayacak gibi oluyor.{/n} "Eşi benzeri görülmemiş bir trajedi! Ne büyük bir kayıp… Lütfen en içten başsağlığı dileklerimi kabul edin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! İmparator'un ışığı, uğrunda can veren maktulün yolunu aydınlatsın. Dehaları, soydaşlarının anılarında canlılığını korusun… Ayrıca bir trajedinin ışığında olsa da Hür Tacir ünvanına hak kazandığınız için tebriklerimi sunarım."
